name: Devourer's Impulse
description: When the round begins: Discard 2 cards from your Hand whose original Elemental Dice Cost is the highest, heal this character for 1 HP, and draw 1 card.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the round begins:</color> $[K56] 2 cards from your Hand whose original Elemental Dice Cost is the highest, heal this character for 1 HP, and draw 1 card.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the round begins:</color> <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 2 cards from your Hand whose original Elemental Dice Cost is the highest, heal this character for 1 HP, and draw 1 card.
